ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 108
ygData.msgSnippet: I never usually post but I thought this must be mentioned. If you go to the cazic-thule corner (www.cazic-thule.com) and look under raffle news you will see
ygData.messageBody:
I never usually post but I thought this must be mentioned. If you go to the
cazic-thule corner (www.cazic-thule.com) and look under raffle news you will
see some of the items up for raffle on Nov 2nd. Scroll down a bit and you
will see gnomish fireworks (4) a spyglass, a collapsible fishing pole, and
some other tinkered things. Obviously someone on my server knows how to
tinker these items. I do not suggest you give up trying to hunt him out.
Because I doubt he would tell you. What this means that if these were not
given by GM's then tinkering is not broken and eventually we will be able to
tinker these things as soon as we find a logical recipe. Good luck.
